item.title: 📝 Blogging: A Brand New Start 🛣️
item.description: Why starting from scratch again? State of the Affairs: 2020 - 2023 I used to have only two articles on this very same blog for the past 2-3 years, without much activity. Part of this was due to personal reasons and particularly health concerns (I had to undergo a dozen of surgeries over a two years time period). And another (bad) reason was that I used to want to make things always picture perfect, but oftentimes people like to swing like a character trait is just a trait without thinking much and discarding actual root causes.
